title: Five Features of Google My Business You Should Be Using
description: Google My Business (GMB) is increasingly important for brick-and-mortar businesses to attract and retain clients. With over eighty percent of people using search engines to find information about local business, it is imperative that business owners take advantage of all GMB has to offer. Justiaâ€™s SEO specialists describe five features of GMB that can help businesses of any size stand out among their competitors in local searches and increase their online visibility.
